  "quantum-computing-neural-networks-synthetic-biology-cryptographic-ledgers-augmented-reality-spatial-mapping-generative-design-algorithms",

  "optogenetic-control-of-neural-circuits-for-restoration-of-sensory-and-motor-function-in-spinal-cord-injury-models",
  "large-scale-graph-analytics-on-heterogeneous-hardware-architectures-with-runtime-workload-rebalancing",
  "privacy-preserving-federated-learning-frameworks-for-cross-institutional-clinical-imaging-datasets",
  "explainable-transformer-models-for-multi-modal-sentiment-analysis-in-human-robot-interaction",
  "self-healing-perovskite-photovoltaics-with-intrinsic-ion-migration-suppression-and-extended-operational-stability"
],
    "links": ["https://example.com", "facebook.edu.co"],
